revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=EA6500 |revision=v2 |upc=745883596027 |ean= |asin=B008I21EA2;US; |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/10/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-EA6500V2 |ic_id=3839A-EA6500V2 |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4708A0 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model= |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4360 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4331 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2605L;SiGe, 2605L, 232HL;3;,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE5003L1;5003L1, 232FE, 3222 HT;3; |flags= |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=FreshTomato-ARM, Tomato (Toastman),Tomato (Shibby), DD-WRT, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} '''Linksys Smart Wi-Fi Router AC1750''' :{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=EA6500}}
"2012/12/17 G", "48SAB402.SCE", and addl. PCB manuf. text (date code :of ''1251'', Dec. 2012) is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. A MAC label affixed to the Ethernet ports indicates usage :of a 00:25:9C OUI, which seems unlikely.
This device has a single USB 3.0 port and a single USB 2.0 port.
Configuration with ''Belkin-Linksys'''s utility may confer a :[[Cisco Connect SSIDs|SSID pattern typical of the ''Cisco Connect'' software]].
{{WiFiCert|WFA20250|07/03/2013}}
===Additional specifications=== :per [[Linksys]] manual *Dimensions: [[Dimensions::256 mm x 40 mm x 184 mm]] *Weight: [[Weight::501 g]]
Power supplies shown in the FCC external photos are... *'''Solytech Enterprise Corporation''' CAD4212 [CAD4212CW-1] (NEMA 1-15P plug) **100-240VAC ~ 50-60Hz, 1.5A -> 12VDC, 3.5A *'''Solytech Enterprise Corporation''' CAD4212L [CAD4212LW-1] (Euro plug) **100-240VAC ~ 50-60Hz, 1.5A -> 12VDC, 3.5A *''unbranded'' MU42-1120350-A1 (NEMA 1-15P) **100-240VAC ~ 50-60Hz, 1.5A -> 12VDC, 3.5A *''unbranded'' IU42-1120350-WP (Euro plug) **100-240VAC ~ 50-60Hz, 1.5A -> 12VDC, 3.5A
